Package com.view

Interface ActiveView

All Superinterfaces:
View
All Known Implementing Classes:
CommandLineView, Graphical2DView, GraphicalTextView, GraphicView, Views 
public interface ActiveView
extends View
The interface Active View. All Controller should have 1 active view. The active view is the view that take care of player entries.
